data.title: Rectangle and Circle improvements
New3dapi: fix loaders
data.body:
- Add texture usage to g3db loader
- Fix adding node parts in g3dj loader
- Update knight.g3db to contain texture usage
- Update knight.g3dj with new json packed colors format and "keyframes" (was "keyframe")

data.title: Add JNI wrappers for Box2d's conveyor belt functions
Polygon add setter
data.body:
Remove 'final' from Polygon's localVertices and add a setter for them.

This is useful for me, at least, for object-pooling of polygons.

data.title: Rectangle, add setSize methods
data.body: For more flexibility

data.title: Improve Polygon's documentation
data.body: I am using a game that uses Polygon and wanted to make some improvements. I thought a good start would be adding more documentation.

data.title: new3dapi remove normal mapping / phong support
data.body: So normal mapping and phong shading works. Let's not include it within default shader to keep things manageble. This PR removes phong and normalmap support, but allows you to add your own shader if needed (all required uniforms/attributes are set).

data.title: proper use max texture units
new3dapi Show async asset loader issue
data.body:
Initialize the skinning matrix to zero.
Changed TextureLoader and the NewModelTest to show the problem with async loading. This shows this for me: http://youtu.be/AKzUb4ujag4 Revert TextureLoader to the changes I made earlier to see how it solves the issue.

data.title: Get back the gdx-tiled-preprocessor
data.body:
For reference here is the forum discussion about these and some more Tiled changes to come: http://www.badlogicgames.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=8911

I see it was removed since people complained about it and the pre-processing step, since it looked like it was required, at least with the old tilemap implementation.

However this is _not_ a required step (anymore), it's just an additional one and will even perform some reduction on the final tileset if using the "--strip-unused" command line option: it will output a new TMX file with additional custom properties and a new AtlasTiledMapLoader has been added to permit loading it.

It has been ported to TexturePacker2 and made it to analyze multiple maps sharing the same tilesets, so missing tiles from other maps using the same tileset shouldn't be a problem anymore, given all the used maps are found in the input directory.

I also noticed that TexturePacker2 didn't avoid duplicate aliases, so this PR will include that patch too.

At this time it requires an Lwjgl application since the TmxMapLoader itself will load maps as it's going to render them: this should be fixed when the loaders will load metadata and graphics resources conditionally.

**NOTE**
On top of these changes, BurningHand and i have been thinking about reorganizing loader code and unifying much as possible, so that to avoid most of the current code duplication: this will be part of a next PR but if you want to look at it to make an idea you ocan find it on my fork (https://github.com/manuelbua/libgdx/commits/tiledmap-base-loader).

data.title: add intersectLinePolygon method
new3dapi: Fix lighting
New3dapi
Maven POMs for building libGDX with Maven
data.body:
This will allow you to deploy to Maven Central using the "standard" process, which is pretty easy once you have jumped through all the hoops to get a Sonatype account.

This only creates artifacts for the things that are currently published to the private libGDX repository. There are a bunch of other things in libGDX that would be nice to get into Maven so that they could be easily added to a GDX project that was generated from the Maven archetype, but I'll start here and add the other stuff later.

data.title: Make LwjglAWTCanvas clean up its created resources on exit
data.body:
LwjglAWTCanvas doesn't clean up after itself on stop() or exit(), and so subsequently created ones misbehave. Swing apps will also report that the OpenAL devices have not been properly closed.

This fixes that (I hope).

data.title: Perform automatic formatting
data.body:
Also remove non-null parameter.

Got owned by Nate because i'm stupid!

data.title: Ouch, fix missing javadocs for null parameter
Add support for ImageProcessor to accept BufferedImage objects as input
data.body:
Update TexturePacker2 to accommodate ImageProcessor changes and exposes new
constructor and method.

data.title: Stage. Add clear() in dispose()
data.body: Without clear() even after "stage = null;" click listeners still work even on another screens.

data.title: Fix issue 1377, Sort Texture atlas regions by their name
data.body:
This change modifies the sorting order of the textures/regions in the atlas to alphabetical on region/texture name.

See [issue #1377](http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/issues/detail?id=1377) for more information.

data.title: New3dapi: various changes, including animation and skinning
data.body:
I'm still not ready cleaning up things etc. but I don't want to have too much changes at once, so here are the changes so far.

It also contains some other changes (I am rewriting DefaultShader to be more readable, include spherical harmonics, etc).

I added the knight g3dj and g3db model for testing.

I updated the fbx-conv PR accordingly https://github.com/libgdx/fbx-conv/pull/3

data.title: iOS Bugfix: playing music files that are not in the assets folder!
data.body:
On a side note: I noted in the iOS Wiki there is a mention to convert sounds to CAF or OGG. I added a comment below. I wonder, what are the benefits of using CAF or OGG besides probably (?) better compression?

Wiki ("Sound" section at bottom):
http://code.google.com/p/libgdx/wiki/IOSWIP?ts=1367735126&updated=IOSWIP

data.title: Setter methods in Ellipse and Circle
data.body: Also was removed unused fields in ellipse.

data.title: Possible bug in Group
data.body:
I have random NullPointerException at com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group.drawChildren (SourceFile:79).

What happens if an actor is added between line 68 and line 77 ?

I think children.size is incremented, but the actor is obviously not added in actors SnapshotArray, so the last child is null.

What do you think ?

Thanks for your time :)

data.title: TmxMapLoader Fix
data.body: This fix makes TmxMapLoader load tilesets through it's FileHandleResolver instead of on it's own. This fixes issues that can occur with custom FileHandleResolvers.

data.title: Add rotated rect to ShapeRenderer and add new PolygonShape.setAsBox method that takes in the center as two floats.
Array 4-arg constructor in GWT emu
data.body: fixed bug introduced by update of SnapshotArray that needed the 4 arg constructor. I just copy/pasted it from the original Array.java and it worked for me...

data.title: Issue 1393: Constructor PolygonRegion (TextureRegion region, float[] vertices)
Maven POMs for building libGDX with Maven
data.body:
This will allow you to deploy to Maven Central using the "standard" process, which is pretty easy once you have jumped through all the hoops to get a Sonatype account.

This only creates artifacts for the things that are currently published to the private libGDX repository. There are a bunch of other things in libGDX that would be nice to get into Maven so that they could be easily added to a GDX project that was generated from the Maven archetype, but I'll start here and add the other stuff later.

data.title: Fix for get (int key, int defaultValue) method in IntIntMap.java
data.body:
Method get is broken.
Ex : Using get(0, -1) on a new IntIntMap would return 0 (zeroValue) instead of that -1 (defaultValue) because there isn't the hasZeroValue check like in the remove method.
